name: Cube Slider V2.0
description:
Use A/ to slide the cube left and right respectively. Dodge the grey blocks and be careful not to slip off the side.

Version 2.0:

Version 2.0 is now live and with it comes a host of new content and features. 6 new levels, music,  arrow key support and a level select menu. (There is also a options menu template however this is non-functional.

Version 2.1

Version 2.1 is now live squashing some bug overhauling the UI and adding one new level.

 Thanks for checking out Cube Slider!
